title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: U.S. Navy Casualties
body: U.S. Navy Casualties        United States Navy     Ford Island Naval Air Station,1        Kaneohe Bay Naval Air Station,18   Pearl Harbor Naval Hospital, 1       Naval Mobile Hospital #2, 1   USS Arizona, 1,104 USS California, 98   USS Chew, 2 USS Curtiss, 21   USS Dobbin, 4 USS Downes, 12   USS Enterprise, 11 USS Helena, 33   USS Maryland, 4 USS Nevada, 50   USS Oklahoma, 415 USS Pennsylvania, 18   USS Pruitt, 1 USS Shaw, 24   USS Sicard, 1 USS Tennessee, 5   USS Tracy, 3 USS Utah, 58   USS Vestal, 7 USS West Virginia, 106     Â      USS Arizona     BB-39, Battleship  Click here      USS California    BB-44, Battleship    Howard L.
